meanings.definition: A settled or regular tendency or practice, especially one that is hard to give up.
meanings.sent1: Eating breakfast every morning is a good habit.
meanings.sent2: It is important to brush your teeth before bed as a habit.
meanings.sent3: His habit of always wearing mismatched socks never fails to make us smile.
meanings.sent4: Procrastination can become a bad habit that is hard to break.
meanings.sent5: The habit of exercising daily can lead to a healthier lifestyle.

meanings.definition: An automatic reaction to a specific situation.
meanings.sent1: Checking your phone as soon as it rings is a common habit.
meanings.sent2: Her habit of saying 'bless you' whenever someone sneezes is endearing.
meanings.sent3: His habit of jumping at the sound of thunder always amuses us.
meanings.sent4: The habit of smiling when you see a friend can brighten their day.
meanings.sent5: The habit of automatically saying 'thank you' is polite and appreciated.
